author: Hadlee Simons
title: Whatsapp hits 900m user mark
text:
Whatsapp has now reached the 900 million user mark, its co-founder Jan Koum said. 
WhatsApp now has 900 million monthly active users," Koum said in a Facebook post. 
The post comes a few months after the Facebook-owned company celebrated hitting the 800 million monthly active user mark in April. 
The team behind the instant messaging app haven't been twiddling their thumbs either, most notably launching Whatsapp Calling for VoIP calls. 
The company also introduced WhatsApp Web this year, which allows users to access the service via a desktop web browser. Read More
